title: How To Use Okta
content:
Click on any of the apps you see and you will be instantly logged in. Signing Into Okta When you are prompted to sign into Okta when attempting to sign into a different app, you will need to use the authentication method you chose. (See here for the setup guide: ) Biometric (fingerprint reader): Enter your username Tap your finger on the fingerprint reader when prompted Done! Okta Verify: Enter your username Check your phone for the Okta Verify push notification (sometimes you need to open the app for it to show up) Press ‘Accept’ Done! Google Authenticator: Enter your username If prompted, select ‘Google Authenticator’ Open the Google Authenticator app on your phone Find the six digit code located under ‘login.simpli.fi’ Enter the code in your browser Enter your password if prompted Done! Okta Browser Plugin For even faster and more convenient method, use the . This allows you to seamlessly sign into all your apps without logging into the dashboard.
